name: Crazy Car Obstacle Challenge
description:
Crazy Car Obstacle Challenge is not only a stunt game but also a simulation game. So if you love racing games as well as the stunt games then this track car game is here to fulfill all your entertainment needs. In each race car game mission, the user will have to complete the objective of a certain race car games mission in order. Perform high jumps on colossal ramps; accelerate through fiery hoops; jimmy through deadly propellers; knock down and smash all types of obstacles. Dash and race through the stunt city at lightning fast speed displaying cool tricks to continue playing next driving car games mission. We assure when you play this amazing game you will happy and need or demand more versions and levels of this game.
Feature:
- Exciting levels to play
- Different amazing and thrilling roads to drive
- Turbo for high speed
- Realistic and smooth Buttons and steering control
- Beautiful 3D Stunt environment.
- Extremely Precise Driving Simulator.
